text: How to create custom cards in the HubSpot API? Any ideas
I think Dev Cards, like here: <https://app.HubSpot.com/docs/20472710/doc/platform/create-custom-crm-cards-with-projects>. But do you mean by normal crm cards?
these are normal cards: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/extensions/custom-cards> and yeah unfortunately at this time developer cards are only available to enterprise accounts
